meanings.definition: The act of managing or controlling prostitutes for profit.
meanings.sent1: The pimpings of the group of women were illegal.
meanings.sent2: She was arrested for her involvement in illegal pimpings.
meanings.sent3: The movie portrayed the pimpings in a serious light.
meanings.sent4: His pimpings of the women were like a dark shadow over the city.
meanings.sent5: The news report exposed the harsh reality of pimpings in the city.

meanings.definition: The act of making something more showy or impressive.
meanings.sent1: The pimpings of the car with flashy lights caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Her pimpings of the outfit with sparkles made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The pimpings of the cake with extra frosting made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His pimpings of the house with decorations turned it into a festive wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The pimpings of the stage with colorful lights created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The act of promoting or publicizing something in an extravagant or aggressive manner.
meanings.sent1: The company's pimpings of the new product were everywhere.
meanings.sent2: Her pimpings of the event attracted a large crowd.
meanings.sent3: The politician's pimpings of the policy were met with skepticism.
meanings.sent4: His pimpings of the concert made it the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity's pimpings of the charity event raised a lot of money.
